price: 62. Ils seront ensuite rendus à Allah, leur Maître véritable. À Lui revient le Jugement, Lui le plus prompt à dresser les comptes.
arabic: ثُمَّ رُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ أَلَا لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَهُوَ أَسۡرَعُ ٱلۡحَٰسِبِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: thumma ruddū ilā al-lahi mawlāhumu al-ḥaqi alā lahu al-ḥuk'mu wahuwa asraʿu al-ḥāsibīna
